name: WHIPSLASH
description:
A short 5 - 15 minute horror game about a cameraman, maze, and a monster.

You're enter a corn maze.  Seems like you've been here before.

Your job is simple:
Run around and photograph 4 cursed objects scattered throughout the maze.
Maybe reminisce about some things along the way.
Make it out alive.

  • Controls:
    • Player movement - WASD
    • Camera movement - Mouse movement
    • Take Photo - Left Mouse Button
    • Sprint - Left shift
    • Jump - Spacebar

Development credits:

  • Made using Unreal Engine 5.0.1
  • This is our first time making a game, so apologies for any scuff.  Half of us had to learn C++ in 2 weeks just to get the game finished.
    • Naishi Sukui - Vtuber - https://www.twitch.tv/naishisukui - Team management, organization, texturing, UV mapping, modeling (camera, WHIPSLASH model, corn stalks), level creation, writing lore, maze design, programming (all mechanics of actors, UI, AI behavior), preliminary concept art, jumpscare animation, main menu art, troubleshooting, exporting, file management, voicing/editing monster screams
    • Thao - Texturing, UV mapping, modeling (WHIPSLASH, newspaper, posters), logo design, writing lore, designing WHIPSLASH, finalizing project
    • JayTM - Streamer - https://www.twitch.tv/jaytm_ - Texturing, UV mapping, modeling (newspaper, posters, scarecrow), level creation, writing lore, maze design, playtesting
    • Taran - Programming (main menu, interactable menu UI), level creation, troubleshooting, playtesting, file management
